mapper.insert: insert into gh_comment ( gh_id, body, parent_id, created_at, updated_at, html_url, url , owner_sid , issue_sid , repository_sid) values ( #{ghId}, #{body}, #{parentId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{htmlUrl}, #{url} , (select sid from gh_owner_info where gh_id = #{ghOwnerId}) , (select sid from gh_issue where gh_id = #{ghIssueId}) , (select sid from gh_repository where gh_id = #{ghRepositoryId}));
